WelcomeScreen.welcomeSubTitle: Nice to see you on Radex
WelcomeScreen.createAs: Our all vehicles are GPS enabled.

ForgotScreen.forgotInfo: Please enter your email address used with your mytroffi account to get a new password
ForgotScreen.linksent: Please check your email account to get your new password. (Also check  your spam folder.)

SignupScreen.verifyLinkSent: We have sent you a link to verify your email account. Please click on link to verify it.

Error.notConnectedToInternet: Internet not connected. Please check your network connection and try a little later.
Error.emailFormatInvalid: Please enter a valid email address.
Error.langUnselected: Please select your language for E-mail notification.
Error.dobEmpty: Please enter your date of birth.
Error.confirmEmailMismatch: Please ensure that your email address and confirmation email address match.
Error.confirmPasswordMismatch: Please ensure that your password and the confirmation password match.
Error.passwordRules: Please ensure that password length must be 6-20 characters, with at least one letter, one number and one special character.
Error.worryTextEmpty: You forgot to write something down.
Error.coreTopicsEmpty: Please select at least one core topic.
Error.languageEmpty: Please select at least one language.
Error.hourlyRateEmpty: Please enter your hourly rate for coaching in €.
Error.experienceEmpty: Please state your years of experience.
Error.descriptionEmpty: Please give a brief description of yourself and your professional experience.
Error.noOffersYet: There are no new requests for you at the moment. You can find your processed requests under Appointments.
Error.firstSlotTimeEmpty: Please enter a suitable time slot.
Error.secondSlotTimeEmpty: Please enter an alternative time slot.
Error.alreadySubmittedRequest: You have already submitted request for admin approval.
Error.unableToAccessDocs: You cannot view/modify your documents as you have already submitted documents for admin approval.
Error.saveProfile: Please save your profile before submitting request for admin approval.
Error.saveProfileBeforeUploadCert: Please save your profile before uploading certificates.
Error.voucherValueInvalid: Please enter an amount ranging between € 50 and € 2000.
Error.hourlyRateInvalid: Please enter an hourly rate ranging between € 10 and € 200.
Error.alreadyConnectedWithStripe: You are already connected with Stripe.
Error.coreTopicsMore: You can only select up to 3 core topics.
Error.noReason: Reason for disapproval is not provided by admin.
Error.lessThanHalfHour: You need to make an appointment at least 30 minutes in advance.
Error.cannnotReschedule: You cannot reschedule an appointment unless the requested time is at least 2 hours in advance.
Error.unsavedChanges: Please save your entries before you proceed.

Success.profileUpdated: Your profile has been updated successfully.

Confirmation.logoutConfirm: Are you sure you want to log out?
Confirmation.deactivateConfirm: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
Confirmation.uploadCertificate: You need to upload your CV and relevant certificates for coaching.
Confirmation.deleteDiaryConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete it?
Confirmation.cancelPaidAppointmentCoachee: Are you sure you want to cancel this coaching? Check the terms and conditions for the cancellation and penalty policy if you cancel less than 24 hours before the scheduled paid appointment.
Confirmation.cancelAppointmentConfirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this coaching?
Confirmation.cancelPaidApptCoach: Are you sure you want to cancel this coaching? A cancellation is subject to a fee, see our terms and conditions for cancellation guidelines.

WorrybinScreen.postWorry: Throw your worry into the bin!
WorrybinScreen.infoMessage: Write down your worry here and throw it into the Worry Bin!

AccreditationScreen.fillCertificateName: Please fill in the certificate name
AccreditationScreen.deleteCertificate: Are you sure you want to delete this certificate?

Voucher.voucherInfo: The gift voucher code of entered amount will only be redeemable for the provided email address. If you wish to change the email address later on, you can write to the administrator at admin@mytroffi.com.

Payment.toYourWallet:
to your mytroffi wallet from voucher management.
You can find your mytroffi voucher account in the menu (3 small strokes at the top left). Click on Voucher management, create a voucher as a gift and follow the instructions on the screen.

DiaryScreen.enterPassword: Please enter your login password here to unlock your diary

APIMessages.emailNotVerified: Your email has not been verified yet. Please verify it through the link sent to your registered email.
APIMessages.emailAlreadyTaken: The entered email address has already been taken.
APIMessages.verificationEmailSent: We have sent you an email to confirm your email address.
APIMessages.somethingWentWrong: Your request can not be processed at the moment. Please try a little later.
APIMessages.emailNotFound: The email address you have entered is not registered. Please enter a valid email address.
APIMessages.passwordReused: Your new password must be different from your previous password.
APIMessages.passwordMismatched: The password you have entered is invalid.
APIMessages.passwordChangedSuccess: Your password has been changed successfully.
APIMessages.profileUpdatedSuccess: Your profile has been updated successfully
APIMessages.profilePicUpdatedSuccess: Your profile picture has been updated successfully.
APIMessages.voucherCodeInvalid: The voucher code you have entered is invalid.
APIMessages.voucherAlreadyRedeemed: The voucher code you have entered has been redeemed already.
APIMessages.subscriptionPaymentSuccess: Your subscription payment has been made successfully.
APIMessages.voucherPaymentSuccess: Your voucher code has been generated successfully. We have sent it in an email. Please check your email account.
APIMessages.voucherRedeemSuccess: Your voucher code has been redeemed successfully.
APIMessages.accreditationPaymentSuccess: Your payment for the accreditation fee has been made successfully.
APIMessages.coachingFeePaidSuccess: The payment for your coaching session has been made successfully.
APIMessages.cannotPay: You cannot pay for this coaching session.
APIMessages.blogNotFound: This blog does not exist anymore.
APIMessages.accountInactive: Your account is inactive. Please contact admin@mytroffi.com for more details.
APIMessages.accountDeleted: Your account has been deleted. Create a new account now.
APIMessages.maxPendingRequestLimit: You can only have up to 3 pending requests.
APIMessages.appointmentBookFailed: Your appointment request cannot be sent to the selected coach. Please request another coach.
APIMessages.ratingDoneSuccess: You have successfully rated your coach.
APIMessages.paymentFailed: Your payment could not be processed. Please try a little later.
APIMessages.accreditationRequestSubmitted: Your accreditation request has been sent to admin. You will receive an answer as soon as possible.
APIMessages.cannotTakeAction: This request has expired because you failed to accept it in time.
APIMessages.cannotCancel: Ongoing appointments can not be cancelled.
APIMessages.invalidDataEntry: Emoticons and images are not allowed.
APIMessages.coachEnteringLateInChat: You missed your coaching or are late for the agreed coaching session. Your coachee waited in vain for you. The chat is now closed and the costs are at your expense. You can find the fee for this in the general terms and conditions.

EntryScreen.whatToDo: What do you want to do?

PushNotification.accreditationRequestApproved: Your accreditation request has been approved.
PushNotification.accreditationRequestNotApproved: Your accreditation request has not been approved.
PushNotification.newRequest: You have received a request from a user.
PushNotification.cancelledByCoach: Coach has cancelled the scheduled appointment.
PushNotification.cancelledByCoachee: Coachee has cancelled the scheduled appointment.
PushNotification.coachResponds: Your coach confirmed your appointment. Please click in "Appointments" on the upcoming coaching and then on "Payment".
PushNotification.coachBeenPaid: Your fee has been sent to your Stripe account.
PushNotification.userRespondReschedule: Coachee responded to the rescheduled appointment.
PushNotification.coachingPaymentDone: Coachee has paid for the scheduled coaching session.
PushNotification.requestRejected: Unfortunately your coach did not accept your request. This can have different reasons, e.g. he/she has no free dates at the moment or he/she cannot serve your topic.
PushNotification.requestRescheduled: Your coach is already occupied at the requested time. Here is a new appointment proposal from your coach for you. If you do not accept it, you will have to fill out a new request to your coach.
PushNotification.subscriptionExpiresIn3Days: Your subscription expires in 3 days. To renew, please click on Subscription in the menu (top left, 3 small dashes) and choose between one or two years. We are pleased that you are using mytroffi.
PushNotification.subscriptionExpiresTomorrow: Your subscription expires tomorrow and you will not be able to receive any more requests from users. To keep your profile online and receive coaching requests, please click on Subscription in the menu (top left, 3 small dashes) and choose between one or two years. We are pleased that you are using mytroffi.

Misc.buySubscription: Your subscription has expired. Buy a new subscription.
